Auth_Heading_VerificationRequiredForFirs: Microsoft verification is required for first use
Auth_Text_CodeCopiedClipboard: The device code has been copied to the clipboard, please click the link below to verify
General_ListNameSet: The list to synchronize is set.
General_NoListNameSet: No list to synchronize is set.
CommandNotice_NothingSelected: It seems that nothing is selected
CommandNotice_SetListName: Set the name of the list to synchronize within settings first.
CommandName_PushToMsTodoAndReplace: Push to Microsoft To Do and replace
CommandName_InsertSummary: Insert summary from Microsoft To Do.
Notice_DeviceCodeCopiedToClipboard: The device code has been copied to the clipboard
Notice_DeviceCodeOnClipboard: The device code has been copied to the clipboard, please enter it in the browser interface that opens
Notice_UnableToAcquireTaskFromConfigured: Unable to acquire task from configured list, check to see it exists and has not been deleted
PluginDescription: An obsidian plugin that syncs Microsoft To Do
Settings_Authentication_Heading_Descript: To use this plugin, you need to authenticate with Microsoft. There is already a client created to do this, if you wish to use your own please update the details below. If empty the default client id will be used.
Settings_Authentication_ClientId_Descrip: The client id is used to authenticate with Microsoft.
Settings_Authentication_Authority_Descri: The authority is used to authenticate with Microsoft. This is https://login.microsoftonline.com/consumers by default.
Settings_JournalFormatting_FolderDescrip: Folder where the diary is stored
Settings_JournalFormatting_PeriodicNotes: Consistent with the Periodic Notes plugin
Settings_Todo_DefaultListName: The default synchronization Microsoft To Do list name
Settings_Todo_DefaultListNameDescription: If it does not exist, the list is created with that name
Settings_Todo_Display_AddCreatedAtOnRepl: If you select to replace the task and this is enabled 'Created at {Time Format}'
Settings_Todo_Display_DateFormatDescript: The format used when adding or rendering a date for a task.
Settings_Todo_Display_Importance_HighDes: Used to display and create/update To Do items if found on line.
Settings_Todo_Display_Importance_LowDesc: Used to display and create/update To Do items if found on line.
Settings_Todo_Display_Importance_NormalD: Used to display and create/update To Do items if found on line.
Settings_Todo_Display_ReplacementFormatD: If you select to replace the task and this is the replacement format, use {{TASK}} as the placeholder
Settings_Todo_Display_Status_CompletedDe: Used between the square brackets in markdown.
Settings_Todo_Display_Status_InProgressD: Used between the square brackets in markdown.
Settings_Todo_Display_Status_NotStartedD: Used between the square brackets in markdown.
Settings_Todo_Display_TimeFormatDescript: The format used when adding or rendering a time for a task.
Settings_Todo_OpenUsingApplicationProtoc: If this is set to true it will open the todo in the locally installed application, set it to off if you want to open the todo in the browser.
Settings_Todo_Display_RegExToRunOnPushAg: RegEx to run on push to remove items from title
When a task is pushed to Microsoft To Do, this regular expression is run against the title to remove any unwanted text.
Settings_NativeApp_Heading_Description: If you have the Microsoft To Do app installed on your computer, you can open the app directly from Obsidian.
Settings_NativeApp_RedirectUriBase_Descr: The base URI used to generate the advanced URI to open locally.
